item.title: SwiftUI Modifiers
item.description: What is a Modifier? In the simplest terms, a modifier in SwiftUI is a method that helps you change or modify a view.

item.title: The Order of Modifiers in SwiftUI
item.description: In SwiftUI, one of the most flexible and powerful features is the use of “modifiers” to alter the appearance and behavior of views.
